response.original_title: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
response.overview: Hapless museum night watchman Larry Daley must help his living, breathing exhibit friends out of a pickle now that they've been transferred to the archives at the Smithsonian Institution. Larry's (mis)adventures this time include close encounters with Amelia Earhart, Abe Lincoln and Ivan the Terrible.
response.tagline: When the lights go off the battle is on.
response.title: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
